private static final List<String> VIDEO_MIME_TYPES =
            Arrays.asList("video/mp4", "video/3gpp");

private static final List<String> COMPANION_IMAGE_MIME_TYPES =
            Arrays.asList("image/jpeg", "image/png", "image/bmp", "image/gif");
